contentrichtext.text: '''Kalsilite''' ([[potassium|K]][[aluminium|Al]][[silicon|Si]][[oxygen|O]]<sub>4</sub>) is a vitreous white to grey [[feldspathoid]]al [[mineral]] that is found in some potassium-rich [[lava]]s, such as from [[Chamengo Crater]] in [[Uganda]]. It has a relative [[Mohs hardness scale|hardness]] of 5.5. == References == * [http://www.mindat.org/min-2142.html Mindat.org] * [http://www.webmineral.com/data/Kalsilite.shtml Webmineral.com] * [http://www.handbookofmineralogy.com/pdfs/kalsilite.pdf Handbook of Mineralogy] [[Category:Potassium minerals]] [[Category:Aluminium minerals]] [[Category:Feldspathoid]]
